title: Augmented Reality and Virtual World Integrated Learning Program for Pre-Service Teacher Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and understanding of core instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Job-linked program for strengthening corporate educator competencies, focusing on educational cases in social contexts (e.g., nonprofit advertising planning)

learning_goals: Learners can explain educational design principles utilizing augmented reality (AR) and 3D virtual worlds (3DVW) and apply them to actual classes.
Learners can develop one or more learning scenarios integrating immersive environments using GLUEPS-AR-like tools.
Learners can design and implement formative assessment strategies for technology-based educational activities in blended learning environments.

resources: Access to Virtual World Platforms (e.g., Google Earth)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
